statements: SELECT * FROM Route_Planning;
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM Route_Planning;
SELECT * FROM Route_Planning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'High';
SELECT route_id, route_name, starting_point FROM Route_Planning ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Route_Planning WHERE charging_station_availability = 'Available' ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Route_Planning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'High' AND charging_station_availability = 'Available';
SELECT route_name, starting_point, ending_point FROM Route_Planning ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Route_Planning WHERE charging_station_availability = 'Limited' OR traffic_conditions = 'Moderate';
SELECT route_id, starting_point, traffic_conditions FROM Route_Planning WHERE ending_point LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY traffic_conditions ASC;
SELECT route_name, charging_station_availability FROM Route_Planning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM route_planning;
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM route_planning ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true;
SELECT id, location, charge_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE charge_speed > 50;
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, traffic_conditions FROM route_planning WHERE charge_level_required < 50;
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE charge_level_required > 50 ORDER BY start_location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, traffic_conditions FROM route_planning WHERE end_location LIKE 'New%' AND charge_level_required >= 70
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic' AND charge_level_required BETWEEN 30 AND 60
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, charge_level_required FROM route_planning WHERE start_location IN ('CityA', 'CityB', 'CityC') ORDER BY charge_level_required ASC, start_location
SELECT location, charge_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY charge_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM route_planning;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition='Heavy';
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM charging_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, traffic_density, traffic_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 60;
SELECT route_name, traffic_condition, charging_station_id FROM route_planning WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM route_planning
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM route_planning WHERE traffic_condition='Heavy Traffic'
SELECT route_name, traffic_density FROM route_planning JOIN traffic_data ON route_planning.route_id = traffic_data.route_id
SELECT MAX(traffic_density) AS max_traffic_density FROM traffic_data
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_lon FROM charging_stations
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions='Heavy';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, required_battery_charge FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE charge_rate >= 2.5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT condition_name, traffic_level FROM traffic_conditions WHERE traffic_level < 0.5;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy traffic' ORDER BY required_battery_charge DESC
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = 'Available' AND capacity > 10 ORDER BY charge_rate
SELECT station_id, location, capacity FROM charging_stations WHERE charge_rate > 2.0 AND availability = 'Available'
SELECT condition_id, condition_name, traffic_level FROM traffic_conditions ORDER BY traffic_level DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_capacity, energy_consumption_rate, efficiency FROM vehicle_stats WHERE energy_consumption_rate < 5.0 ORDER BY battery_capacity ASC
SELECT id, location, available_chargers FROM charging_stations;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_level > 3;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE battery_level < 20;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, charging_station_id FROM vehicle_history WHERE trip_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT route_id, traffic_level FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_level > 3;
SELECT location, available_chargers, id FROM charging_stations WHERE available_chargers > 0 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT route_id, distance FROM routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_level FROM vehicles WHERE battery_level < 50 ORDER BY battery_level ASC;
